name: Super Mortimer
description:
This game was made as part of Aalto University master level course Game Project. It was created during 6 weeks with a team of 3 persons with different backgrounds. The goal of the project was to create a short clone of an existing game.

This game tries to simulate the video game classic Super Mario Bros. published 1985 by Nintendo. Basic mechanics of the this game are inspired by the original and it uses the level design of level 1-1 of the original game. However, audiovisual artwork for this clone has been created by the project team.

Team
